attributes.action: Keep our bus service only bus running from ossett to leeds
attributes.additional_details: We want you to help us keep our bus service as its the only bus running from ossett to leeds and we need it so does the elderly too
attributes.background: Help ossett keep the 117 bus which is the only bus running from ossett to leeds

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local bus services are a matter for individual bus companies and the relevant local authority, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
